C1''' - ADSL/ADSL2/ADSL2+ modem (router/bridge). D-Link Part number: RSL2500UEBRU9C1 (with firmware ver. RU_1.00). The processor is part BCM6332KFBG. Some people report about serial flash chip Winbond W25Y16VSIG. (See [http://adslhw.pskov.ru/ ADSL Hardware] Â© [mailto:fregl@inbox.ru Fregl].)
On board presents unidentified chip "Grouptek HST-1601DR", DIP16. (Look message at 18 Mar 2012 17:48:22 with MSGID "2:461/155 4f6621e9" from Alexey Korop 2:461/155@fidonet to Ilya Yanok, with subject "DNS" in echoconference ru.linux.chainik.) ==Pictures==
'''Retail Images''' File:DSL-2500U BRU D Front.jpg|Front view File:DSL-2500U front panel.jpg|Front panel File:DSL-2500U back panel.jpg|Rear panel
